comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: We’re hoping to have it fixed whenever the next patch (not hotfix) goes out. Not sure when that is though.

comments.author: werdernator.6105
comments.body:
So, the match_details.json-endpoint no longer returns owner_guild-uuids.

https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/wvw/match_details.json?match_id=1-1 for proof

this seems to be broken since the “May-19-2015”-Patch, the last time my tracker tracked a claim was 2015-05-19 16:00:02 UTC (Guild “Dull Egotistical Raiding Party[DERP]” claimed “Rogue’s Quarry” in Matchup "Stormbluff Isle-Maguuma-Henge of Denravi (T3-NA))

Intended? I hope not :>
